name: Treacherous Lawns
description:
Lawns across the country have been taken over by vicious pests.

Folks can't mow their lawns anymore, and need someone fit for the task.

Are you up to it?

Mow through 15 lawns filled with dangerous pests!

Go for a quick time or total pest control to get high scores and ranks!

Face man-sized moles, fire-spitting slugs, and actual lightning bugs!

Made with Unity.
